revised_title: The Olive in the Mediterranean: Its Culture and Use in Ancient Greece
tldr: This article explores the history and use of the olive tree and its products in the Mediterranean world, focusing on ancient Greece. It discusses the cultivation, climate, and economic importance of olives in Greek lands, as well as the archaeological and botanical evidence for their use in ancient times. The article also highlights the role of olives in Greek society, including their impact on trade, storage, and distribution.
